Entries.NPC.cs.4001: I found a dusty old book in the library that showed me the way to that fruit!$h#$b#I was sure you'd love it, so I gave it to you to show how much I appreciate you.#$b#It's in my nature to take care of other people... but since we've been together, you've shown me what it's like to feel cared for in return.$7#$b#I love you, @.$l

Entries.Krobus_Stardrop: I found a dusty old book in the library that showed me the way to that fruit!$h#$b#I was sure you'd love it, so I gave it to you to show how much I appreciate you.#$b#It's in my nature to take care of other people... but since we've been together, you've shown me what it's like to feel cared for in return.$7#$b#I love you, @.$l

Entries.event_pool4: ...Oh, @. I thought you did, but I wasn't sure.$6#$b#I'll never forget this moment...$6

Entries.Penny_spouse: These vapors... You'll have to go on without me...$u

Entries.Indoor_Night_4: Ready to tuck in? I'm pretty tired myself.

Entries.Indoor_Night_4: #$c .5#Ready to tuck in? I'm pretty tired myself.#Hi, @! I can finish this chapter later if you wanted to tell me about your day.

Entries.marriage_bus2: That's a great gift idea! @ would-#$b#Oh, hi! Um. We weren't talking about any... surprises...$h
